description:
The finals is Miyaji VS Fukuhara. Leaving the anchor match to Naoki, Aichi and Ren face off in the fourth match. As Ren goes all out to enjoy the fight, his PSYqualia reveals a destiny that should`ve been lost.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kako demo Mirai demo Nai Kioku
Memories Neither from the Past Nor Future
過去でも未来でもない記憶
